    • Method Detail

      • login

        public static void login(javax.swing.JTextField usernameInput,
         javax.swing.JPasswordField passwordInput)
        Checks the given username and password combination against the database. If they match it outputs a pop-up notification to notify the player that he/she has successfully logged in. If they do not match it outputs a pop-up notification to notify the player that he/she was unsuccessful in logging in.
        Parameters:
        usernameInput - username inputted by player
        passwordInput - password inputted by player
